title: Baihe - Lily Vegetarian - Dongcheng
description: Bejing vegetarian restaurant 百合素食 located at 东直门内北小街草园胡同甲23号, is affiliated with Restaurant "Lily" (Jimenqiao branch and Summer Palace branch). Food is vegetarian and mostly vegan. Subway to Dongzhimen or Beixinqiao. Location is in a small alley, inside an old house, and you pass the courtyard of ancient doorway to get inside.
